Hydras:

Hydras growled and said "What do you know about current events???"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Nobody knows the names of his personalities. He is just 
Chimera 
> to the outside world.
> 
> Bic:
> 
> Chimera began to feel impatient.
> 
> Chimera: With the predacons of course! How many times will I have 
to 
> repeat it? My best weapon is the words I wield. I manipulate my 
> enemies into doing what I make them think is best for them. 
Simple. 
> Even a dinobot would get this!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Hydras::
> >

optics
